targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  val AS "Temperatur"
FROM 
  ts_number n
LEFT JOIN
  datapoints d on (d.id=n.id)
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFrom()*1000<ts and $__unixEpochTo()*1000>ts AND
  d.name='hm-rpc.1.WEATHER001.1.TEMPERATURE'
ORDER BY ts

  ts AS "time",
  val AS "Luftfeuchtigkeit"

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  val AS "Regen"
FROM ts_bool b
LEFT JOIN
  datapoints d on (d.id=b.id)
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFrom()*1000<ts and $__unixEpochTo()*1000>ts AND
  d.name='hm-rpc.1.WEATHER001.1.RAINING'
ORDER BY ts

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  val AS "Regen"
FROM ts_bool b
LEFT JOIN
  datapoints d on (d.id=b.id)
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFrom()*1000<ts and $__unixEpochTo()*1000>ts AND
  d.name='hm-rpc.1.WEATHER001.1.RAINING'
ORDER BY ts

SELECT
  	ts AS "time",
		@x:= CASE WHEN t1.val - (select t2.val from ts_number t2,datapoints d2 where t1.ts > t2.ts AND d.name='hm-rpc.1.WEATHER001.1.RAIN_COUNTER' AND t2.id=d.id order by ts desc limit 1) >= 0
  			THEN t1.val - (select t2.val from ts_number t2 where t1.ts > t2.ts AND d.name='hm-rpc.1.WEATHER001.1.RAIN_COUNTER' AND t2.id=d.id order by ts desc limit 1)
  			ELSE val
  		END as "Regenintensität",
	@y:=@y+@x as "Regenmenge Gesamt"
FROM 
	ts_number t1,
	(select @y:=0) as t,
	datapoints d
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFrom()*1000<ts and $__unixEpochTo()*1000>ts AND
  d.name='hm-rpc.1.WEATHER001.1.RAIN_COUNTER' AND
  t1.id=d.id
ORDER BY t1.ts

SELECT
  	ts AS "time",
		@x:= CASE WHEN t1.val - (select t2.val from ts_number t2,datapoints d2 where t1.ts > t2.ts AND d.name='hm-rpc.1.WEATHER001.1.RAIN_COUNTER' AND t2.id=d.id order by ts desc limit 1) >= 0
  			THEN t1.val - (select t2.val from ts_number t2 where t1.ts > t2.ts AND d.name='hm-rpc.1.WEATHER001.1.RAIN_COUNTER' AND t2.id=d.id order by ts desc limit 1)
  			ELSE val
  		END as "Regenintensität",
	@y:=@y+@x as "Regenmenge Gesamt"
FROM 
	ts_number t1,
	(select @y:=0) as t,
	datapoints d
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFrom()*1000<ts and $__unixEpochTo()*1000>ts AND
  d.name='hm-rpc.1.WEATHER001.1.RAIN_COUNTER' AND
  t1.id=d.id
ORDER BY t1.ts

SELECT
  	ts AS "time",
		@x:= CASE WHEN t1.val - (select t2.val from ts_number t2,datapoints d2 where t1.ts > t2.ts AND d.name='hm-rpc.1.WEATHER001.1.LIGHTNING_COUNTER' AND t2.id=d.id order by ts desc limit 1) >= 0
  			THEN t1.val - (select t2.val from ts_number t2,datapoints d2 where t1.ts > t2.ts AND d.name='hm-rpc.1.WEATHER001.1.LIGHTNING_COUNTER' AND t2.id=d.id order by ts desc limit 1)
  			ELSE t1.val
  		END as "Blitzintensität",
	@y:=@y+@x as "Anzahl Blitze Gesamt"
FROM 
	ts_number t1,
	(select @y:=0) as t,
	datapoints d
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFrom()*1000<ts and $__unixEpochTo()*1000>ts AND
  d.name='hm-rpc.1.WEATHER001.1.LIGHTNING_COUNTER' AND
  t1.id=d.id
ORDER BY t1.ts

SELECT
  	ts AS "time",
		@x:= CASE WHEN t1.val - (select t2.val from ts_number t2,datapoints d2 where t1.ts > t2.ts AND d.name='hm-rpc.1.WEATHER001.1.LIGHTNING_COUNTER' AND t2.id=d.id order by ts desc limit 1) >= 0
  			THEN t1.val - (select t2.val from ts_number t2,datapoints d2 where t1.ts > t2.ts AND d.name='hm-rpc.1.WEATHER001.1.LIGHTNING_COUNTER' AND t2.id=d.id order by ts desc limit 1)
  			ELSE t1.val
  		END as "Blitzintensität",
	@y:=@y+@x as "Anzahl Blitze Gesamt"
FROM 
	ts_number t1,
	(select @y:=0) as t,
	datapoints d
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFrom()*1000<ts and $__unixEpochTo()*1000>ts AND
  d.name='hm-rpc.1.WEATHER001.1.LIGHTNING_COUNTER' AND
  t1.id=d.id
ORDER BY t1.ts
